inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addDamageReduction('Fire', 'Stackable', 2); effect.getBonuses().addDamageReduction('Electrical', 'Stackable', 2); effect.getBonuses().addDamageReduction('Cold', 'Stackable', 2); effect.getBonuses().addDamageReduction('Acid', 'Stackable', 2); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Energy Resistance
description: Your exceptionally strong mind gives you a resistance to energy effects.  You can shrug off the first 2 points of Fire, Electrical, Cold, and Acid damage from all attacks.
